crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'sms' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; var direction = doc.pvt_authorization_type == 'resource' ? 'inbound' : 'outbound'; emit([doc.pvt_created, doc._id], {'id' : doc._id, 'from' : doc.from_user, 'to' : doc.to_user, 'created' : doc.pvt_created, 'direction' : direction , 'status' : doc.pvt_status, 'body' : doc.Body }); }

queued.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'sms' || doc.pvt_deleted || doc.pvt_status != 'queued') return;  emit(doc.pvt_created, {'id' : doc._id} ); }

listing_by_owner.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'sms' || doc.pvt_deleted || !doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].cf_flow) return;  Flow = doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].cf_flow; if((doc.pvt_authorization_type != 'user' || ((Flow.module != 'user') && (Flow.children['_'] && Flow.children['_'].module != 'user'))) && !doc.pvt_owner_id && !doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].target_owner_id ) return; if((Flow.children['_']) && (Flow.children['_'].module == 'user')) emit([Flow.children['_'].data.id, doc.pvt_created], {'id' : doc._id, 'from' : doc.from_user, 'to' : doc.to_user, 'created' : doc.pvt_created, 'direction' : 'inbound' , 'status' : doc.pvt_status, 'body' : doc.Body}); if(Flow.module == 'user' ) emit([Flow.data.id, doc.pvt_created], {'id' : doc._id, 'from' : doc.from_user, 'to' : doc.to_user, 'created' : doc.pvt_created, 'direction' : 'inbound' , 'status' : doc.pvt_status, 'body' : doc.Body}); if(doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].target_owner_id ) emit([doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].target_owner_id, doc.pvt_created], {'id' : doc._id, 'from' : doc.from_user, 'to' : doc.to_user, 'created' : doc.pvt_created, 'direction' : 'inbound' , 'status' : doc.pvt_status, 'body' : doc.Body}); if(doc.pvt_owner_id) emit([doc.pvt_owner_id, doc.pvt_created], {'id' : doc._id, 'from' : doc.from_user, 'to' : doc.to_user, 'created' : doc.pvt_created, 'direction' : 'outbound' , 'status' : doc.pvt_status, 'body' : doc.Body});}

listing_by_device.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'sms' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; if(doc.pvt_authorization_type != 'device' || doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].cf_flow.module != 'device' ) return; if(doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].cf_flow.module == 'device' ) emit([doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].cf_flow.data.id, doc.pvt_created], {'id' : doc._id, 'from' : doc.from_user, 'to' : doc.to_user, 'created' : doc.pvt_created, 'direction' : 'inbound' , 'status' : doc.pvt_status, 'body' : doc.Body}); if(doc.pvt_authorization_type == 'device' ) emit([doc.pvt_authorization_id, doc.pvt_created], {'id' : doc._id, 'from' : doc.from_user, 'to' : doc.to_user, 'created' : doc.pvt_created, 'direction' : 'outbound' , 'status' : doc.pvt_status, 'body' : doc.Body});}

deliver_to_device.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'sms' || doc.pvt_deleted || doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].cf_flow.module != 'device' || doc.pvt_status != 'pending') return; emit([doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].cf_flow.data.id, doc.pvt_schedule.start_time], {'id': doc._id}); }

deliver_to_owner.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'sms' || doc.pvt_deleted || doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].cf_flow.module != 'user' || doc.pvt_status != 'pending') return; emit([doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].cf_flow.data.id, doc.pvt_schedule.start_time], {'id': doc._id}); }

deliver_to_offnet.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'sms' || doc.pvt_deleted || doc.pvt_status != 'pending' || (doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].cf_flow.module != 'offnet' && doc.pvt_call['Key-Value-Store'].cf_flow.module != 'resources')) return; emit( doc.pvt_schedule.start_time, {'id': doc._id}); }
